paragraphs: STB Electrical Services is a locally owned and operated business providing reliable, safe and professional electrical solutions across Victoria.
We pride ourselves on transparent pricing, quality workmanship and friendly customer service from the first call to project completion.
No job is too small—from a simple power point replacement to complex commercial fit‑outs and emergency fault finding.
